not.remember.password: {icon}Do you not remember your password? click {link} to reset it
registration.instructions: Fill the following fields in order to register a new user
name: Name
photo.confirmation: Is it okay to use this photo?: '{fileName}'
delete.account.warning.header: You are about to delete your account
delete.account.warning.content: If you decide so, we will send you a confirmation to your account email in order to finish the process
delete.user.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
no.users: There's no users registered in the application
no.users.with.data.provided: There's no users with the data provided
result.users.filtered: Result of users filtered by email '{email}':
account.info.changed: Your account info has been changed
change.avatar.instructions: To change the avatar, you must click in the button below and select an image from your computer. The image need to have .jpg or .png format.
home.info: Welcome, this is a skeleton page for creating an application using react
admin.panel.info: Welcome, the basic functionality this administrator panel offers consists in administrate the users of the application
